params.i: Index of the asset to deposit
params.rateMinRAY: Minimal exchange rate between the deposited asset and the LP token

params.i: Index of the asset to deposit
params.minAmount: Minimal number of LP tokens to receive

exchange_all(int128,int128,uint256).details: Sends an order to exchange the entire balance of one asset to another

params.rateMinRAY: Minimum exchange rate between coins i and j

params.j: Index for the underlying coin received
